mapper.select: SELECT tp.id id, tp.mid_prod_no midProdNo, tp.crafwork_id crafworkId, tp.carf_seq carfSeq, tp.mac_minutes macMinutes, tp.emp_minutes empMinutes, tp.day_amount dayAmount, cp.crafwork_name crafworkName, cp.is_check isCheck, tp.unit unit, mp.`status` status FROM prod_crafwork_path_plm_aud tp LEFT JOIN crafwork_struct_plm cp ON cp.id = tp.crafwork_id AND cp.company_id = tp.company_id AND cp.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN product_mid_plm pmp ON pmp.mid_prod_no = tp.mid_prod_no AND pmp.company_id = tp.company_id AND pmp.deleted = 'F' LEFT JOIN prod_crafwork_main_plm mp ON mp.prod_no = pmp.prod_no AND mp.company_id = pmp.company_id AND mp.deleted = 'F' where tp.MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tp.path_no = #{pathNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tp.DELETED = 'F' AND tp.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by tp.carf_seq
